note: Boosts of other people's interesting toots; things I'm learning/re-learning; news and information I feel I should pass on. Interested in storytelling, art, music, gamedev, computing, maths, languages, mental health, kind people

name: Profile picture alt text
value: Satellite dish from crystal heart puzzle of Forsaken City, from the game Celeste. Doesn't appear to be transmitting.

name: Header picture alt text
value: From the game Celeste: Madeline, in the Awake subchapter of Old Site, standing on top of the stone structure that normally houses the crystal heart, looking up into the stars. The stone structure is empty -- the heart is not there.
